title: Pedagogical Workshop Based on Early Childhood Arithmetic Learning Trajectories (LT)

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of elementary arithmetic concepts and instructional experience
context.additional_context: Most learners are in-service teachers or pre-service educators, aiming to improve arithmetic teaching methods for young children

learning_goals: Learners can explain a step-by-step instructional strategy based on Learning Trajectory (LT) theory.
Learners can diagnose a young child’s current level and design arithmetic activities at the next higher level (Level 1).
Learners can apply context-specific storytelling techniques to solve targeted-level problems.
Learners can propose personalized learning support plans for low-achieving young children.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
